title: Ticket #2091: Condor_submit should warn or fail if undefined macro used
description:
This might be mostly applicable for submit files for DAG nodes.

For example, if you say 

  output = $(outfile)

in your submit file, but don't define $outfile in the DAG file there should at least be a config option to give a warning, and maybe the possibility to turn that into a fatal error. (I think the warning or error should come from condor_submit itself, though, not from DAGMan.)
creator: wenger
